QuestData.Title: Evacuation
QuestData.Description: We've escaped death through dumb luck, $n. But luck is running out.$B$BThe coast is becoming flooded even as we speak. And from the look of it, the landmass beneath us hasn't quite settled yet.$B$BI hate to say this, but we have to leave. Curses, $n.... I cannot lose my homeland twice in one lifetime. Yet these earthquakes are not an enemy we can defeat.$B$BTell Gwen Armstead to start the evacuation.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Gwen Armstead in Duskhaven.
QuestData.RewardText: Liam is right. We must get everyone to higher ground.$B$BYou must help me spread the word while I manage the logistics of the evacuation.
